scripts.version:patch: php -r "$version = exec('git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo \'0.0.0\''); $parts = explode('.', $version); $parts[2]++; $newVersion = implode('.', $parts); exec('git tag -a v' . $newVersion . ' -m \'Version ' . $newVersion . '\''); echo 'Version updated to ' . $newVersion . PHP_EOL;"
scripts.version:minor: php -r "$version = exec('git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo \'0.0.0\''); $parts = explode('.', $version); $parts[1]++; $parts[2] = 0; $newVersion = implode('.', $parts); exec('git tag -a v' . $newVersion . ' -m \'Version ' . $newVersion . '\''); echo 'Version updated to ' . $newVersion . PHP_EOL;"
scripts.version:major: php -r "$version = exec('git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || echo \'0.0.0\''); $parts = explode('.', $version); $parts[0]++; $parts[1] = 0; $parts[2] = 0; $newVersion = implode('.', $parts); exec('git tag -a v' . $newVersion . ' -m \'Version ' . $newVersion . '\''); echo 'Version updated to ' . $newVersion . PHP_EOL;"
